                    Childhood vascular tumors may be classified into four groups.
                    
											                    
											                    Benign tumors    Benign tumors are not cancer. This summary has information about the following benign vascular tumors:            -  Infantile hemangioma.     -  Congenital hemangioma.     - Benign vascular tumors of the liver.     -  Spindle cell hemangi
